alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 30 at 3:32PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Kimball, southwestern Banner, southeastern Goshen and eastern Laramie Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 332 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hillsdale, or 12 miles east of Cheyenne, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pine Bluffs, La Grange, Burns, Albin, Hillsdale, Meriden Rest Area, Gun Barrel, Panorama Point and Carpenter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; Goshen County
